lemonade.description: Our garden has a lemon tree. Lucie teaches Felix what to do when life hands you lemons.
lemonade.title: Lemonade

oakland1.description: We are exploring the East Bay parks. This one, Middle Harbor Park, is tucked right next to the giant cranes of Oakland's harbor, where the long freight trains get loaded with cargo.
oakland1.title: Oakland 1

oakland2.description: Cranes, boats, train tracks... this park's got it all!
oakland2.title: Oakland 2

school1.description:
Even before his first day of preschool, Felix rehersed what goes on there. The first thing is a parent drops you off before heading for work.

In real life, Felix did not handle it as well as his stuffed animals. He cried hard when Lucie left. After 15 or 20 minutes, he calmed down, and had a good time the rest of the time. The teachers say he is being independent: he follows the movement and enjoys the activities, but he rejects their offers of closer interaction.
school1.title: School 1

school2.description: Then there is circle time. The teacher plays some instrument, everyone sings, and then we talk about the day's events.
school2.title: School 2

school3.description: Acting out lunch.  Everyone brings their own lunch box from home.
school3.title: School 3

school4.description: Acting out nap time. Felix hasn't taken a nap at school yet:  Lucie picked him up after lunch this week. Next week, though, he will be spending his first full day.
school4.title: School 4

school5.description: Felix acts out all the other school activities.  There are lots of things to do:  plenty of books, playground equipment, and many many toys.
school5.title: School 5

school6.description: The part that Felix loves acting out the best, is when the mommies and daddies come back to pick up their child.
school6.title: School 6

snuggery1.description: The day before his first day; Felix and Lucie went to visit the school for a couple of hours. First thing first: Felix locates a book about planes.
snuggery1.title: Snuggery 1

snuggery2.description:
Felix's preschool is called The Snuggery. It's a 10 minute stroller ride from home.

It has a smallish indoors and a big outdoors, where the kids spend a good part of the day. The outdoor has both sun and shade, with nice big trees and playground equipment.
snuggery2.title: Snuggery 2

snuggery3.description:
... and even a little house!

There are about 24 kids attending the school. None of them appear on the photos, because their parents might object to them being posted on the internet. The ages range between 2 and 5, with the bulk at about 3.5 years old. Everyone stays together throughout the day, except for a few things (for example, a dance teacher comes once a week, for the older kids). The idea is that the young ones learn from observing the older ones; and the older ones get a ego boost from teaching the little ones.
snuggery3.title: Snuggery 3

snuggery4.description: There are a variety of toys out for free play, like these bins filled with rice, scoops and tubes. During free play, the teachers mostly police, making sure that all the kids play nice. There are also times with more structured activities, where kids are divided in small mixed-age groups (about 6 for 1 teacher), for things like painting, craft projects, or reading books. A yoga teacher comes once a week.
snuggery4.title: Snuggery 4

snuggery5.description:
The toys rotate from day to day, to keep things interesting. 
Also, The Snuggery often goes out on outings. Ohlone park and the "Kid's Gym" at the YMCA are weekly destinations, both within walking distance.
snuggery5.title: Snuggery 5

terrys1.description: Sunday evening visiting the Joyces.   Why is Amanda burying a letter?
terrys1.title: Terrys 1

terrys2.description: Amanda's explanation was a little hard to understand.   But one thing is certain:  the letter must be buried!
terrys2.title: Terrys 2

terrys3.description: Terry, from previous experience, makes sure that everything buried is biodegradable.
terrys3.title: Terrys 3

description: We are settling into our new house. First week of commuting by BART for Dean, first visit with the new mid-wife for Lucie, and first day of preschool for Felix. We've all been tired at night!
title: May 16
